changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION calculate_distance(lat float, lon float, recordLat float, recordLong float) returns double precision LANGUAGE SQL AS $$ SELECT ( 3958.8 * acos( cos( radians( lat ) ) * cos( radians( recordLat ) ) * cos( radians( recordLong ) - radians( lon ) ) + sin( radians( lat ) ) * sin( radians( recordLat ) ) ) ) $$
